amendment.description: To authorize a program to commemorate the 60th anniversary of World War II.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3283 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3283 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S6478-6479; text: CR S6479) To authorize a program to commemorate the 60th anniversary of World War II.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3283 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3283 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Warner.
